src:
Timnas Indonesia U-19 Siap Jalani Kualifikasi Piala Asia
05 Nov 2019, 15:17 by Indra Virgiantara


Timnas Indonesia U-19 Siap Jalani Kualifikasi Piala Asia

KBRN, Jakarta : Tim nasional Indonesia U 19 akan menjalani kiprahnya di ajang kualifikasi Piala AFC 2020. Pada Rabu (06/11/2019) besok,  Timnas U-19 akan menghadapi Timor Leste di laga perdana yang berlangsung distadion Madya Senayan, Jakarta pukul 19.00 WIB.
Pelatih timnas Indonesia U-19, Fakhri Husaini mengatakan, para pemainnya dalam kondisi yang baik dan siap menjalani laga kualifikasi piala Asia dalam press conference yang berlangsung di hotel Century, Jakarta, Selasa (05/11/2019). "Kami timnas Indonesia U-19 telah siap menjalani laga pertama besok, semua pemain termotivasi, sangat antusias. Syukur alhamdulillah, sampai persiapan terakhir kondisi 22 pemain dalam keadaan sehat, siap dan bermain semaksimal mungkin. Dan hanya pemain yang mengalami cedera yaitu Fadil dan sudah diganti dengan Fadilah Nur dari diklat Ragunan," ungkapnyaIndonesia dalam kualifikasi Piala Asia 2020 tergabung dalam grup K bersama Timor Leste, Hongkong, dan Korea Utara. Sebagai tuan rumah dan dengan kekuatan yang ada timnas U-19 difavoritkan untuk lolos ke putaran final Piala Asia 2020 mendatang.
text:
Indonesian U-19 national team ready to live the Asian Cup qualifiers
05 Nov 2019, 15:17 by Indra Virgiantara


Indonesian U-19 national team ready to live the Asian Cup qualifiers

KBRN, Jakarta: The U19 Indonesian national team will undergo its work in the AFC 2020 Cup qualification event. On Wednesday (06/11/2019) tomorrow, the U-19 national team will face Timor Leste in the inaugural match which took place at the Madya Senayan stadium, Jakarta at 19.00 WIB
Indonesia U-19 national team coach, Fakhri Husaini said, the players were in good condition and ready to undergo the Asian Cup qualifying match in a press conference that took place at the Century hotel, Jakarta, Tuesday (05/11/2019). "Our Indonesia U-19 national team is ready to undergo the first match tomorrow, all players are motivated, very enthusiastic. Thank God, until the final preparations the condition of 22 players is in good health, ready and playing as much as possible. And only the injured player is Fadil and already replaced with Fadilah Nur from Ragunan Education and Training, "he said Indonesia in the Asia Cup 2020 qualification joined in group K with Timor Leste, Hong Kong and North Korea. As the host and with the strength of the U-19 national team is favored to qualify for the upcoming 2020 Asian Cup finals.
